title: NA account transfer to Japan server
body: I am receiving an error when trying to transfer my NA account to Japan, which is where i live. Has anyone been able to transfer their account or know anything that will help me??!!?!

replies.body: There was an issue that we discovered that caused some transfers to fail; we resolved it not too long ago. Can you try again and see if you're still having issues transferring?
i still can't change my region ...
Is it not free to transfer?
I thought it was going to be free to transfer to the Japan server from NA or am I mistaken?
So if I transfer my acct to JP, do I still have my champs?skin?icon?RP?IP?

> [{quoted}](name=Mr PuppyBro x,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AonOabGV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-01T22:43:30.913+0000)
>
> So if I transfer my acct to JP, do I still have my champs?skin?icon?RP?IP?

The only thing you will lose will be your rank division.Champions,skins,icons,rp and ip are all staying the same.
Can I go on Japan server when I'm on Japan server can I go back
